description: Individual report using Python and Jupyter Notebook to solve physics problems, assessed on task completeness, result quality, writing quality, and analysis (12 pages)
8 weekly formative Moodle quizzes on lecture material (Weeks 2-5,7-9) and one final summative quiz in Week 10
8 weekly 4-hour lab sessions with experiments (long/short/computational/flexible), assessed through pass/fail oral interviews demonstrating experimental and computational skills
5000-word report on chosen experiment with peer review (Weeks 5-7) and viva examination, including analysis of results and computational methods
